intro: Lepistemon leiocalyx, commonly known as the slender-leaved lepistemon, is a flowering plant native to New Zealand. It thrives in moist, shaded environments and is often found in forest understories. Due to its limited distribution, it is considered a rare and endangered species in its native habitat.
